thread.title: Panthers Get Lucky Bounce, Score On Ridiculous Fumble Recovery
thread.title_full: Panthers Get Lucky Bounce, Score On Ridiculous Fumble Recovery | Complex UK

author: Gavin Evans
title: Panthers Get Lucky Bounce, Score On Ridiculous Fumble Recovery
text:
It's still pretty early in the season, but it appears likely that, once again, the Bucs suck. That's usually to be expected when you just had the No. 1 overall pick. And while crappy teams are bad enough on their own, they also seem to frequently have the ball bounce in favor of the other team, case in point embedded as a Jonathan Stewart fumble still somehow turned into a 57-yard score for the Panthers . It gave thousands of people on Twitter a chance to tweet "Just how they drew it up," and also allowed Ted Ginn to blow up two defenders with one block.
[via Vine ]
